channel.title: External HDD problem
channel.description: I have this external harddrive that I use from time to time, but today, my craptop sees it, but it says "Searching for content..." for minutes on end and I can't access my files. It's worked fine a few months ago, but it's being a prick to me now.

item.title: External HDD problem
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
As it´s already been said, try it on another PC, if problem persists, take the external cover off and insert the actual hard drive in to a PC and see if it works (Sometimes, crappy cases just die, but the hard drive can be ok)

Read full topic

item.title: External HDD problem
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Does the external hard drive still work with other computers? That’d be the first test; HDD’s have a limited lifespan, and it could be that your external HDD is dying.

Read full topic

item.title: External HDD problem
item.dc:creator: DenDrio
item.description:
I have this external harddrive that I use from time to time, but today, my craptop sees it, but it says “Searching for content…” for minutes on end and I can’t access my files. It’s worked fine a few months ago, but it’s being a prick to me now.
